metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46219 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
HSTS long file name clears contents

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46219` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.81.0-1ubuntu1.14
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.81.0-1ubuntu1.14
libcurl3-nss - 7.81.0-1ubuntu1.14
libcurl4 - 7.81.0-1ubuntu1.14
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.81.0-1ubuntu1.14').
